name: hebridean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
from or relating to the Hebrides (= a group of islands to the west of Scotland): She rented an isolated cottage on a small Hebridean island. a Hebridean fisherman
More examplesFewer examplesHe grew up on the Hebridean island of Scarp.The Soay is a Hebridean sheep.a folk song with a lovely, delicate tune that sounds almost Hebridean
